recipesJson.name: GAMMA
recipesJson.author: Xtrafa
recipesJson.description:
One of my co-workers asked me to try his bottle of "Hulk Tears" he had bought at a local B&M. Very nice vape... Tasted Watermelon right off the bat, followed by something a little "green" and sour which I felt may have been Apple or possibly Kiwi, then a subtle smooth vanilla creaminess, and just a hint of something else hidden in there adding a little berry color to the mix. 

This is my inspired first attempt at what I tasted that day. It is by no means a clone recipe (maybe vanilla whipped cream instead of vanilla swirl), but it's close on the flavor profile, very smooth, and passes the test of "Is it a good vape?" with flying colors (I think). 30 days and 240ml gone, the guys at work are asking for more... Hope you enjoy!
